entries.notes: Often refers to a professional or specific type of person.
Often used for 'person' in a relative clause or humble context.
Often used as noun modifier (自動の).
Often used for feelings or memories coming and going.

entries.meaning: to drive around / to ride around
to hold / to have / to possess
to take out / to carry out
to take home / to carry back
to gain weight / to grow fat

entries.notes: Used as a suffix for 'how to do X' (e.g., 書き方).
Usually used as 心待ちにする (to look forward to).

entries.meaning: to fit / to suit / to match
how many times / how many degrees
all at once / at one time

entries.notes: Someone outside the field of expertise.
Often used for beginner books (e.g., 'Introduction to X').
Used as a prefix for direction/comparison (e.g., above, below).
Often used in te-form (知っています) for state of knowing.

entries.meaning: with the exception of / other than

entries.notes: Often used to describe a person's nature.

entries.meaning: to be conceited / to be arrogant

entries.notes: Na-adjective (特別な). Compounds: 特 (N4.30) + 別 (N4.9)

entries.meaning: feature (e.g. in a magazine) / special edition
to substitute / to replace / to change

entries.notes: Often used as 堂々とした (modifying noun) or 堂々と (adverb).

entries.meaning: to open (a book/event) / to hold (an event)

entries.notes: Often used as a suffix indicating purpose (e.g. 子供用 - for children).
Used as a suffix (e.g. 東京市).

entries.meaning: to spread / to propagate / to widen

entries.notes: Na-adjective (広大な). Compounds: 広 (N4.33) + 大 (N5.9)

entries.meaning: to be built / to be erected

entries.notes: Used as suffix for departure time/place.

entries.meaning: to commute / to go back and forth
to let pass / to pass through
